messages.message:
<!channel> Hi folks --

We've had a lot of problems w/ Crafting after the recent sec incident. The immediate problems are solved as far as I can tell -- however, I've heard that some folks are still having trouble with their sandboxes.

*If your sandbox is broken:*
1. Pull master & rebase
2. Resync your sandbox & rebuild the base image
3. Suspend, wait 1 min, resume
4. Check <#C05L87V014J|> for solutions (search backwards)
*If your sandbox is still broken:* Please reach out to me directly, with these details:
1. Clear description of the problem
2. Logs
3. Direct link to your sandbox
For US-based folks, I'll have office hours tomorrow from 9am-5pm EDT -- any free slot on my calendar is free. Please feel welcome to put a 10-15 min block on my calendar.

We really want to get folks unblocked ASAP. Thanks!
